post.title: bell turbo hub (w35) speed issue
post.content: any one have data speed issues? i use to get 4- 5 mb down and 1.2-2.3 mb up. now i have a hard time to pass 2mb down and .5 up!!! same signal strenth checked my external antenna all seem well. i think they are testing hspa+4x mb i wonder if it can be that.
